did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Oral History Interview, Mission San Xavier del Bac, with Bernard Fontana 1959
did.abstract: Verbatim transcript of interview at Mission San Xavier del Bac between Father Nicholas Perschl, O.F.M., and Bernard L. Fontana, Dept. of Anthropology, University of Arizona. Interview concerns period from 1914 to 1923, when Perschl was responsible for the areas of Tucson, Ariz. and Mission San Xavier del Bac.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Verbatim transcript of interview at Mission San Xavier del Bac between Father Nicholas Perschl, O.F.M., and Bernard L. Fontana, Dept. of Anthropology, University of Arizona. Interview concerns period from 1914 to 1923, when Perschl was responsible for the areas of Tucson, Ariz. and Mission San Xavier del Bac.
Article based on this interview was published in Kiva, v. 24, no. 3, February 1959.
